text: dangnan phu dı thi totheiyng cea nı reuxng khxng khea (xisa) hlangcak thi di mi khwam ru mayang cea læw k cng klaw theid wa than thanghlay cng ma theid rea k ca reiyk luk «khxng rea læa luk khxng phwk than læa reiyk brrda phuhying khxng rea læa brrda phuhying khxng phwk than læa taw khxng phwk rea læa taw khxng phwk than læw rea k ca wingwxn kan (tx xallxhˌ) dwy khwam nxbnxm doythi rea ca khx hı laxˌnat khx ngxallxhˌ phung prasb kæ brrda phu thi phud kohk
